channel.title: Couple interface questions
channel.description:
Ive just started messing with private servers again and was wondering if someone could explain a few things? The first is it looks like we now have the ability to control interfaces completely in the new sources? I assume this since Ive seen working SoF's. As far as I can tell its something to do with sending a "config" to the client? Second, Sending texts to interfaces seems to have a second of lag where the original text appears first, I assume this is a client side issues, not sure though, Is there a way to make the transition smooth and cut out the old text completely?
Thanks, Hiaburi

item.title: Couple interface questions
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Ive just started messing with private servers again and was wondering if someone could explain a few things? The first is it looks like we now have the ability to control interfaces completely in the new sources? I assume this since Ive seen working SoF’s. As far as I can tell its something to do with sending a “config” to the client? Second, Sending texts to interfaces seems to have a second of lag where the original text appears first, I assume this is a client side issues, not sure though, Is there a way to make the transition smooth and cut out the old text completely?

Thanks,
Hiaburi
